intro.p: The GStreamer team is proud to announce a new development release of the GStreamer C# bindings for the GStreamer 0.10.x release series.
The GStreamer 0.10.x release series is a stable series targeted at end users.

p.strong: Please note that at this time the GStreamer C# bindings are not consindered API/ABI stable, and public interfaces may still change from release to release. These changes will most likely be small. Please read the README file for more information on this.

features.feature: Improve Gst.Buffer bindings and add ByteReader/BitReader bindings

bug.summary: Setting properties on gulong Element throws exception
